item.title: Pink Floyd - Another Brick In The Wall, Pt. 2 - Key of C
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Another Brick In The Wall (part 2) by Pink Floyd
Using the chords: Dm G F C
Suggested Strum Patterns: D D DU DU or D UD UDU or D UD DU DU (it's all about the timing for this one, try out a few)
Notes: When playing Dm chords trying muting using your left hand little finger to stop the strings ringing on
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended
